main event: An observer reported seeing a bright light resembling a star moving at a high rate of speed in Smyrna, Tennessee on July 13, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a basketball,The object appeared to be a bright star and was likely Altair,The light instantaneously disappeared and reappeared briefly,The observer was a 44-year-old experienced pilot,The sighting lasted for about 6 to 7 minutes with a straight south-southwest course.
witness description: 44-year-old rated USAF pilot with 16 years experience and 5 years as an airline pilot
